directions: Mix soup, sour cream, butter, potatoes, onion, cheese and black pepper to taste in 3-quart shallow baking dish.  Sprinkle corn flakes over potato mixture.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45 minutes or until hot.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
title: Jill's Hash Brown Casserole
